summary: OWN 2002 ENVOY FROM GMC,AFTER 15,000 MILES DEVELOPED A GRINDING NOISE IN WHEELS.HAVE BEEN BACK TO DEALER AND SPOKE TO GMC DIRECT.THEY HAVE TRIED TO CORRECT 5 TIMES.THEY ACKNOWLEDGE PROBLEM IN AXLE.HAVE PUT CONVERSION KIT IN TO CORRECT,WHICH DIDN'T WORK.MECHANIC CLAIMS DEALERSHIP HAVE TWO OTHER ENVOY'S WITH SAME PROBLEM.I BELIEVE THIS MAYBE A MANUFACTURING DEFECT.THEY ARE TRYING TO RESOLVE THIS PROBLEM FOR ME.I AM NOT REQUESTING ANY HELP WITH THIS ISSUE.I WANT THIS AT LEAST TO BE A MATTER OF RECORD FOR ANY FUTURE COMPLAINTS WHICH MAY COME YOUR WAY.
